articles.title: Top EU leader rebukes Scott Morrison during awkward New York encounter - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: As more countries openly criticise the new AUKUS defence pact, European Council President Charles Michel reminded the Prime Minister of the need for “transparency and loyalty”.
articles.content:
Michel later tweeted that he had a frank, direct and lively exchange with Morrison about AUKUS.
Clarity is needed between friends. Dialogue is key to build strong partnerships. We will stay in close… [+2164 chars]
